effect.black_white: Inflicts regular damage. The greater the user’s weight compared to the target’s, the higher power this move has, to a maximum of 120. User’s weight | Power -------------------------------- | ----: Up to 2× the target’s weight | 40 Up to 3× the target’s weight | 60 Up to 4× the target’s weight | 80 Up to 5× the target’s weight | 100 More than 5× the target’s weight | 120
effect.black_2_white_2: Inflicts regular damage. The greater the user’s weight compared to the target’s, the higher power this move has, to a maximum of 120. User’s weight | Power -------------------------------- | ----: Up to 2× the target’s weight | 40 Up to 3× the target’s weight | 60 Up to 4× the target’s weight | 80 Up to 5× the target’s weight | 100 More than 5× the target’s weight | 120

short_effect.black_white: Power is higher when the user weighs more than the target, up to a maximum of 120.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Power is higher when the user weighs more than the target, up to a maximum of 120.

flavor_text.black_white: The user slams into the target with its heavy body. The more the user outweighs the target, the greater its damage.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user slams into the target with its heavy body. The more the user outweighs the target, the greater its damage.
